07/07/23 03:31
It would be hard to imagine any member of the royal family scrubbing toilets, selling fish and chips from a van, or serving drinks to someone. But for a few who had humble beginnings and married into The Firm, these very normal and not very glamorous jobs were their reality. Here  MailOnline reveals the jobs which members of the royal family held before they married into The Firm - from working in a yoghurt shop in California to starting a PR business.
